snippet: Urine has a uniquely valuable role in medicine: It holds clues not just to what people eat and drink, but also to how well their bodies are functioning.
abstract: Jane E Brody Personal Health column on the various medical uses of urine, which can give clues about dietary health and organ function.
lead_paragraph: Urine has a uniquely valuable role in medicine: It holds clues not just to what people eat and drink, but also to how well their bodies are functioning.

headline.seo: A Valuable Medical Tell-All Can Be Found in Urine
headline.main: A Medical Tell-All Can Be Found in Urine
headline.print_headline: A Medical Tell-All Can Be Found in Urine
